doc.name: productDetailsReceived
doc.summary: Sent when product details have been successfully retrieved from the App Store.

description.overview: Handle the productDetailsReceived message if you want to perform an action on receipt of localized product details from the App Store.

parameter.name: product
parameter.description: The identifier of the product for which you wish to retrieve the details.

parameter.name: details
parameter.description: An array describing the product, containing the following keys:

option.description: the localized title of the product
the localized description of the product
the price of the product in the local currency (as given by the currency code)
the symbol representing the local currency
the currency symbol in UTF-16 encoding

description.comments: The productDetailsReceived message is sent to the current card of the application when localized product details are received from the App Store. Product details are requested using the iphoneRequestProductDetails command.
